00045       if (mode == LOCK_MODE_SHARED)
00046         std::cout << "LOCK ACQUIRED shared" << std::endl;
00047       else if (mode == LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE)
00048         std::cout << "LOCK ACQUIRED exclusive" << std::endl;
00049       else
00050         std::cout << "LOCK ACQUIRED " << mode << std::endl;
00051     }
00052     virtual void lock_released() { std::cout << "LOCK RELEASED" << std::endl; }
